short_summary: Request for standing offer for acquisition of miscellaneous grocery products...
description: Tenders are invited for the acquisition of the following Unnumbered Classifications of goods …
full_summary:
Here is the information about the current tender for E6MON-23PQEP
===============

Summary
-------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Correctional Service of Canada, and the Department of National Defense, is inviting interested suppliers to submit a stand-offer proposal for the procurement of miscellaneous grocery products in Quebec.

Details
-------

- **Commissioning agency** : Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Tender reference number** : WS3976528407-Doc3976560887
- **Solicitation number** : WS3976528407
- **Last amendment date** : May 15, 2023
- **Closing date** : June 5, 2023
- **Expected start date** : Not specified
- **Expected end date** : June 30, 2024
- **Status of the tender** : Expiré

Product Description
-------------------

The client is searching for a supplier to provide the following products:

- Food and beverages
- Edible oils and fats
- Chocolate and sugars
- Seasoning and preservatives
- Cereal and pulse products
- Dried fruits

Packaging Requirements
----------------------

- Packages will be delivered to the storage locations in Quebec, as detailed in the Annex A of the tender document.

Key Dates
------------

- **Release date of the tender document** : April 28, 2023
- **Closing date for the shuttle bid** : June 5, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EDT)

Submission Guidelines
------------------------

All bids must be received by 2:00 PM (EDT) on the closing date. Any bid received after this time will be rejected. 

Where to submit the bid
-------------------------

This bid will be submitted electronically through the Ariba electronic procurement platform.

Important – Mandatory Access Protocol (MAP) and Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI/DSS) require that when senders exchange sensitive data via email, it has to be encrypted through the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Webkey.
 
For More information 
================ Funcitonary Help

To obtain information and verify of the documents, please contact  
Ly, Selina 
SPAC, PSPC.
The main contact. TPSGC (Mail address: selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
